I don't know how far Cartoon Network got into Kenshin... What episode 
did it stop? Did they even finish the Kyoto arc? Personally, for me 
if it did I'd rather have the anime stop right there as I've always 
felt it went downhill after especially towards the end... If they 
didn't even do the Kyoto arc yet, then yeah, I'd definitely be upset. 

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Warg3791@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/14/2004 12:55:02 PM Eastern Standard Time, 
> Warg3791@a... writes:
> I'm wondering if this is even a permanent thing though. They never 
showed the 
> Kyoto arc but once. Maybe they intend to move it around later? 
Include it in 
> the Adult Swim line-up at some point? They do that sort of thing 
all the time 
> with their other anime. I wouldn't be a bit surprised to see it 
turn up again 
> soon anyway. I finally gave up on them myself. I'm slowing gather
> I was going to say slowy gathering the loose change from my sofa 
cushions, 
> etc. to buy the final episodes I don't have. Sorry! I accidently 
hit the button 
> to send it off prematurely!!! My bad!
> -a very ashamed MissBehavin.
